verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H7121>read<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and therein was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%>, that an <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> and a <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> should not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>,

because they <S%H6923>met<s%> not the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%>, but <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> against <S%H7043>them<s%>, to curse <S%H430>them<s%>: howbeit our God <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7043>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>.
And it came to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, when they had heard the <S%H8451>law<s%>, that they <S%H914>separated<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the mixed <S%H6154>multitude<s%>.

Now <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H475>this<s%>, Eliashib the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who was <S%H5414>appointed<s%> over the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, being <S%H7138>allied<s%> unto <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>,

had <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3957>chamber<s%>, where <S%H6440>aforetime<s%> they <S%H5414>laid<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offerings<s%>, the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain<s%>, the new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and the <S%H3323>oil<s%>, which were given by <S%H4687>commandment<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, and the <S%H7778>porters<s%>; and the <S%H8641>heave-offerings<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>.

But in all this time I was not at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; for in the <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> I <S%H935>went<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H7093>after<s%> certain <S%H3117>days<s%> asked I <S%H7592>leave<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>,

and I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%>, in <S%H6213>preparing<s%> him a <S%H5393>chamber<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it <S%H3415>grieved<s%> me <S%H3966>sore<s%>: therefore I cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> all the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H3627>stuff<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah<s%> out <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>commanded<s%>, and they <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>: and thither brought I <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, with the <S%H4503>meal-offerings<s%> and the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>.

And I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4521>portions<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> had not been <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3881>them<s%>; so that the Levites and the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%>, were <S%H1272>fled<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then <S%H7378>contended<s%> I with the <S%H5461>rulers<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Why is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>? And I gathered them <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> them in their <S%H5977>place<s%>.
Then <S%H935>brought<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1715>grain<s%> and the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> and the <S%H3323>oil<s%> unto the <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.

And I made <S%H686>treasurers<s%> over the <S%H214>treasuries<s%>, <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%>, and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%>: and next to <S%H3027>them<s%> was <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%>; for they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H539>faithful<s%>, and their business was to <S%H2505>distribute<s%> unto their <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, concerning <S%H4229>this<s%>, and wipe not out my <S%H2617>good<s%> deeds that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the observances <S%H4929>thereof<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> I in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> some men <S%H1869>treading<s%> <S%H1660>wine-presses<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, and bringing <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6194>sheaves<s%>, and <S%H6006>lading<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H3196>therewith<s%>; as also wine, <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and <S%H8384>figs<s%>, and all manner of <S%H4853>burdens<s%>, which they <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: and I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> wherein they <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H6718>victuals<s%>.

There <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> men of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> also <S%H935>therein<s%>, who brought in <S%H1709>fish<s%>, and all manner of <S%H4377>wares<s%>, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7451>them<s%>, What evil <S%H1697>thing<s%> is this that ye <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>?

Did <S%H6213><s%> not your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H935>thus<s%>, and did not our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon <S%H5892>us<s%>, and upon this city? yet ye <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H2740>wrath<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8179>that<s%>, when the gates of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> began to be <S%H6751>dark<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, I <S%H559>commanded<s%> that the <S%H1817>doors<s%> should be <S%H5462>shut<s%>, and <S%H559>commanded<s%> that they should not be <S%H6605>opened<s%> till <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>: and some of my <S%H5288>servants<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> I over the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that there should no <S%H4853>burden<s%> be brought <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
So the <S%H7402>merchants<s%> and <S%H4376>sellers<s%> of all kind of <S%H4465>wares<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> or <S%H8147>twice<s%>.

Then I <S%H5749>testified<s%> against <S%H559>them<s%>, and said unto <S%H3885>them<s%>, Why lodge ye <S%H5048>about<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>? if ye do so <S%H8138>again<s%>, I will <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H6256>you<s%>. From that time forth <S%H935>came<s%> they no more on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>.

And I <S%H559>commanded<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that they should <S%H2891>purify<s%> <S%H935>themselves<s%>, and that they should come and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, this <S%H2347>also<s%>, and spare me according to the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> also <S%H7200>saw<s%> I the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that had <S%H3427>married<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H796>Ashdod<s%>, of <S%H5984>Ammon<s%>, and of <S%H4125>Moab<s%>:

and their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> in the speech of <S%H797>Ashdod<s%>, and <S%H5234>could<s%> not <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H3066>Jews<s%>' language, but according to the <S%H3956>language<s%> of <S%H5971>each<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And I <S%H7378>contended<s%> with <S%H7043>them<s%>, and cursed <S%H5221>them<s%>, and smote <S%H582>certain<s%> of <S%H4803>them<s%>, and plucked off their hair, and made them <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H5414>saying<s%>, Ye shall not give your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> unto their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, nor <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, or for yourselves.

Did not <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> by these <S%H7227>things<s%>? yet among many <S%H1471>nations<s%> was there no <S%H4428>king<s%> like <S%H157>him<s%>, and he was beloved of his <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: nevertheless even <S%H1571>him<s%> did <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> cause to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

Shall we then <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto you to <S%H6213>do<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to <S%H4603>trespass<s%> against our <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3427>marrying<s%> <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>?

And one of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3111>Joiada<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>, was <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law to <S%H5571>Sanballat<s%> the <S%H2772>Horonite<s%>: therefore I chased him from <S%H1272>me<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H430>them<s%>, O my God, because they have <S%H1352>defiled<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>, and the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%>, and of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

Thus <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> I them from all <S%H5236>foreigners<s%>, and <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H4931>charges<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H4399>work<s%>;

and for the <S%H6086>wood<s%> - <S%H7133>offering<s%>, at <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H2163>appointed<s%>, and for the <S%H1061>first-fruits<s%>. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God, for <S%H2896>good<s%>.
